name: MasterFlow – Beta
description:
A full library to easily document your userflows, screens, and product features.


Just drop a flow component and switch the path, kind of interaction, and the what happens next.


Paths and Flows (default + dashed):

  • Straight
  • Corners
  • Snake
  • Hook
  • U-Turn
  • Split


Also Included:

  • Interactions
  • Process blocks such as decision, terminators, delay, etc.
  • Cover template with status
  • Group/Swimlane
  • Internal page content/actions
  • Comment
  • Helpful product feature documentation


If this has touched your heart, feel free to donate.
